jobs.name: Hourly Git Auto-Sync
jobs.description: Commits and pushes all workspace changes every hour. Detects conflicts and alerts Nev.
jobs.prompt: Run the git sync: exec `python /root/.openclaw/workspace/skills/git-sync/sync.py` and check the result. If sync succeeded or there was nothing to commit, stay silent. If there is a MERGE CONFLICT or push failure, alert Nev immediately with the details.

jobs.name: Urgent Email Scanner
jobs.description: Scans Gmail every 30 minutes during waking hours and alerts on urgent emails.
jobs.prompt: Run the urgent email skill: exec `python /root/.openclaw/workspace/skills/urgent-email/scanner.py` and report the output to Nev. If urgent emails are found, summarise them clearly. If the output is HEARTBEAT_OK, stay silent.

jobs.name: Daily Morning Briefing
jobs.description: Delivers a consolidated morning briefing to Nev at 7am GMT every day.
jobs.prompt: Run the daily briefing: exec `python /root/.openclaw/workspace/skills/daily-briefing/briefing.py` and send the full output to Nev on Telegram as a single message. Do not summarise or shorten it ‚Äî send it exactly as generated.

jobs.name: Nightly Security Audit
jobs.description: Runs a full 4-perspective security audit of the codebase at 3:30am GMT nightly.
jobs.prompt: Run the nightly security audit: exec `python /root/.openclaw/workspace/skills/security/audit.py` and deliver the findings to Nev on Telegram. Any CRITICAL findings must be flagged immediately and prominently. Group other findings by perspective. Keep the message concise ‚Äî numbered list format.

jobs.name: Weekly Gateway Security Check
jobs.description: Verifies gateway security config every Monday at 04:00 GMT.
jobs.prompt: Run a gateway security verification: exec `python /root/.openclaw/workspace/skills/security/audit.py --perspective operational` and check that: (1) gateway is bound to localhost or LAN only, (2) auth is enabled, (3) no .env files are committed to git. Report findings to Nev. If all clear, send a single line: 'Gateway check: all clear üõ°Ô∏è'

jobs.name: Hourly Database Backup
jobs.description: Auto-discovers and backs up all SQLite databases every hour. Keeps last 7. Alerts on failure.
jobs.prompt: Run the database backup: exec `python /root/.openclaw/workspace/skills/db-backup/backup.py` and check the result. If backup succeeded, stay silent. If backup FAILED for any reason, alert Nev immediately with the error and which database failed.

jobs.name: Daily OpenClaw Update Check
jobs.description: Checks for OpenClaw updates every morning at 4:30 AM.
jobs.prompt: Run an update check: exec `openclaw update check` and report to Nev if a major update is available. If everything is up to date, stay silent.
